sub_title: Product Manager – KPN Smart Integration (KPN ICT-B2B CO Integration P&S)
summary:
Managing IT enabled key-accounts.

Fulfiling the trusted advisor role in mapping KPN product developments to customer business needs to ensure maximum benefits gained from IT as enabler of the customer core business processes.

Tactical steering on active service delivered to customer (including Underpinning contracts) as well as initiating new types of services to be delivered.

Operational Excellence: Understanding and Valuing Business Models

projects.title: XLA - Xperience Level Agreement
projects.description: Xperience Level Agreement is a mindset and toolbox to rethink enterprise IT. It applies design thinking to combine ‘tech’ and ‘touch’. Abstract drivers of success become tangible and manageable.

profile_positions.description:
Operational steering of the KPN partner contract with “Mindtree” in India for the SL-IT Platform Teams.
Responsible for implementing, monitoring and adjusting Service Line – IT wide OLA’s, SLA’s, DAP’s and Underpinning Contract for KPN supplier Mindtree.

Involvement in handling escalations and setting up improvement plans together with the supplier.
Initiation and coordination of the Sourcing Improvement  plans  with goal to maximize the competitive advantage for KPN and here customers by upmost utilization of our true partner relation.

profile_positions.title: Manager Process – Management Escalation - Global team

profile_positions.description:
•	WMS offshore, Procesverantwoordelijk ITIL / GSDM bij Offshore werkzaamheden WMS naar India (incl. creatie IAP / SPA)
•	CIC migration, Procesverantwoordelijke  ITIL Integratie GDC CIC (incl. inrichten bijbehorende DAP / OLA – CIC)
•	Opbouw Internal Framework Agreement (ontwikkeling keten Interaction Protocol (IAP) & Service Provision Agreement (SPA))
•	Organisatie & participatie workshops vorming GSDM 3.0 Getronics procesmodel, diverse operationele ITIL processen (omzetting van ITIL 2 naar ITIL v3).
•	Operationalisatie End 2 End case management model binnen Getronics inclusief ontwikkelen bijbehorende OLA targeting mechanisme.
•	Ontwikkeling & implementatie GSC Service Intake proces (gecontroleerd in beheer nemen van nieuwe dienstverleningen in de organisatie).
•	SDU in Motion, borging aansluiting ITIL processen  koppeling GSC
•	Nieuwe dienst MIPT – Introductie & aansluiting volgens ITIL (Getronics GSDM) standaard. Landing dienst begeleiding binnen GSC Budapest
•	Ondersteuning ontwerp nieuwe service management tool Getronics.
•	Trainer Internal FRW process management training
•	Onderdeel van het FRW operationalisatie squad binnen het organisatie brede FRW in delivery programma.
